entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Port Carling
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:31 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -29.6°C

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
